channel.title: About Tavern
channel.description:
This category is for the discussion of [Tavern](https://gitlab.com/ngerakines/taver), an open source activitypub server written in Golang.
This category is great for:
* Tavern updates, release announcements and news. * Questions about how to contribute to, troubleshoot, and operate Tavern.
# GitLab Project: https://gitlab.com/ngerakines/tavern Issues: https://gitlab.com/ngerakines/tavern/-/issues Milestones: https://gitlab.com/ngerakines/tavern/-/milestones Change Log: https://gitlab.com/ngerakines/tavern/-/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md Federation: https://gitlab.com/ngerakines/tavern/-/blob/master/FEDERATION.md
# KeyBase Team: https://keybase.io/team/tavern_town

item.title: About Tavern

item.description:
This category is for the discussion of Tavern, an open source activitypub server written in Golang.

This category is great for:
